name: RobotMix
description:
Hello every body!

Resume

        Robot Mix is a short project game made for school (ETPA). A concept of one week conceived by an other classmate and chose to be made by one person in 2 weeks.

Pitch

          You have to collect robot parts and bring them to the center to build the robot asked. Take care of colors required and objects forms.

Controls

          _ Only with keybord, no mouse;

         - movements : LeftArrow / Q, RightArrow / D , UpArrow / Z and DownArrow / S

          - Drop objects in hands to the ground : Spacebar / Ctrl (left or right)
